name: RUSH'D CUT
description:
Cut out tiles as fast as you can in this fast paced little game.

Draw out the shape displayed as fast as you can on the grid, once the shape is drawn those tiles will be destroyed. Tracing larger shapes will give you credits (top right), these can be spent on making tiles or rotating the target shape. When a certain amount of tiles have been cleared (top left) you can regenerate the grid, but keep all your points. The game ends when the timer at the bottom runs out, but each tile destroyed adds time to the timer.

left mouse = select tile

right mouse = make tiel

a / d = rotate

w = next stage

F11 = toggle fullscreen
